node.title: Kiwi rugby league legend Olsen Filipaina in intensive care due to kidney failure
node.description: The 64-year-old has been hospitalised in Australia.
node.content: ["Kiwi rugby league great Olsen Filipaina has been hospitalised with Kidney failure.", "On Thursday, Alf Filipaina took to social media to reveal his brother was in the Intensive Care Unit in a New South Wales hospital.", "\"On the 13th of January 2022 Olsen was taken to hospital with a stomach infection and on arrival went into ICU,\" he wrote in a Facebook post.", "\"His condition improved over a few days regarding the infection, but [the] kidney problem that he has had for many years worsened, to the extent that he had to be transported to Westmead Hospital, where he was to be seen by the kidney specialists.", "\"Over the past few days he's been up and down and as a result is now in ICU.\"", "Filipaina etched his name in NZ rugby league folklore by leading the Kiwis to victory over Great Britain and a highly vaunted Australia in 1985.", "He played over 100 games in the NRL, predominantly as a Balmain Tiger.\u00a0", "\"Our thoughts and prayers are with him and the wh\u0101nau as I know yours will be too.\"", "\u00a0"]
